casebody.data:
Nicholas Todd SUTTON, Petitioner,
v.
TENNESSEE. No. 19-7689 (19A910) Supreme Court of the United States. February 20, 2020

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice Sotomayor and by her referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals of Tennessee, Eastern Division denied.
